Title: Riftwalker
Description:
[h1]Riftwalker[/h1]
[list]
[*] Cornered?
[*] Tough enemy in the way?
[*] Barrier blocking your path?
[*] Bored, and looking for a way to instantly teleport 25 strata below Qud?
[/list]
Space-time vortices are your friend!

Riftwalker adds a new mutation and new items to the game to make it easier to go exploring through vortices.
[h2]Features[/h2]
[list]
[*] A new Escape Vortex mutation, to help you get out of tough situations by diving into a vortex.
[*] The vortex jar and riftwalker's backpack items, which can both be used to spawn new vortices.
[*] Vortices spawned by the Space-Time Vortex mutation now spawn at the location selected by the player (rather than a random adjacent tile). The mutation cost of Space-Time Vortex is slightly increased. This change _only_ applies to
the player, not to NPCs that use Space-Time Vortex.
[/list]
Source code: https://github.com/kernelmethod/QudMods/tree/main/Riftwalker
